A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have seen this three times. It's bold and different. It takes all the expectations and theories and throws them off the cliff. Rian Johnson has a voice and a vision. Most of the scenes were great. A few made me tear up. There some scenes and characters that don't work but I think overall it is a good film and it will have fans thinking\, arguing\, and reflecting for a long time(or until Solo comes out in May). P.S. I am not a bot. I have been a Star Wars for about 33 years. Watch it and decide for yourself\, at least twice.
